name: InsightontheScriptures
0:
”Alexa open insight on the scriptures”
”Alexa ask insight on the scriptures to tell me about David”
”Alexa ask insight on the scriptures to tell me about the book of Psalms”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: insight on the scriptures
des:
A Bible Encyclopedia. 
Insight on the Scriptures is a comprehensive Bible encyclopedia that will deepen your knowledge of many Bible topics. A valuable tool for personal Bible study, Insight on the Scriptures contains thousands of detailed entries, such as the following: people places plants animals notable events Bible expressions.
*This is not the official skill jw.org skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
